afcc102f-6810-4653-8d31-92401659da58.description: The Forbes Funds, with our partners: The University of Pittsburgh, The Department of the Future, and The Heinz Endowments is delighted to announce the inaugural class of the Anti-Racism Cohort (ARC). ARC is a year-long learning cohort that builds on the best practices of diversity, equity, and inclusion training and optimizes these core practices into human-centered design exercises that aid in systemically shifting organizational cultures.
